column3:
Yubli would have you assist with some alpaca husbandry.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Sprinkle insect repellent on the backs of the waiting alpacas.
Would you be willing to spend some time with the alpacas? The fuzzy creatures need extra-special care in the heat and humidity, and I was hoping you'd oblige.
To maintain the herd in peak condition, the peddlers periodically treat them with insect repellent. The recipe itself is courtesy of the Hanuhanu.
I'll give you enough vials of repellent to get the job done. Drop by the enclosure and sprinkle a few drops on each alpaca's back. That's all there is to it!
The alpaca murmurs contentedly. With its lustrous coat gleaming, the creature looks ready to charge around in delight.
Easy girl, easy! They're just trying to keep you healthy!
You hear the creature breathing softly. It seems completely at ease.
You must have surprised the alpaca while it was drinking. Fortunately, it appears unoffended by the intrusion.
Thank you for handling that. How are the alpacas faring?
I see, I see... It always surprises me how creatures in the same herd can behave so differently. We'll have to make sure we cater to their individual temperaments!
The Hanu use the same repellent on their younglings. It's about as pungent as you'd expect for something that wards off the region's pests, but it's perfectly harmless.
The Turali Travel Agency relies as much on the alpacas as any other member of staff. They're just as deserving of the finest care!
